formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Conduction (Fourier’s law for a plane wall) Q = k A ΔT / L q'' = Q / A In LaTeX: Q = k\,A\,\frac{\Delta T}{L}, \quad q'' = \frac{Q}{A} Convection (Newton’s law of cooling) Q = h A ΔT q'' = h ΔT In LaTeX: Q = h\,A\,\Delta T, \quad q'' = h\,\Delta T Thermal radiation (Stefan–Boltzmann, diffuse-grey surfaces) Q = ε σ A (T_h^4 − T_c^4) q'' = ε σ (T_h^4 − T_c^4) In LaTeX: Q = \varepsilon \,\sigma\,A \left(T_h^{4}-T_c^{4}\right), \quad q'' = \varepsilon \,\sigma \left(T_h^{4}-T_c^{4}\right)
